title: [NOT BLIZZARD SHILLING] Tracer being added to Heroes of the Storm
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LzaMOGjKMXw

hnnnnnnng
(okay maybe a little bit of Blizzard shilling she looks fucking great with unique play patterns to accompany her odd kit which is why HotS always wins, Blizz gives you funky shit but lets it actually work instead of normalising everything a la Leegy ligaments)
